common_family_master_long_award: Create and invite friends to your family，earn a lot money
common_family_desc: Family is a group chat room, you can invite more friends to play together, such as voice chat and singing ,each one is the indispensable part of your family , the patriarch can hold some events to make the family interesting；
common_family_desc1: 1.Each account can create or join a family
common_family_desc2: 2.You can appoint deputy patriarch and elder, they can help you to manage the family
common_family_desc3: 3.Family members up to 100 ,  you should kick out the inactive members once in a while
common_family_desc4: 4.The patriarch can get 10‰ commission of the diamond when family member spend golds in Sukie
common_share_content: Share to social network will make it easier to get commission
common_invite_content: Your friends must enter your invitation code within 24 hours after register, so that you get the 20% commission of his diamond income, your friends can get the secret prize;
common_invite_content1: 1.You can invite million friends, but each account can only enter one invitation code
common_invite_content2: 2.You can't get the commission if your friends enter the code beyond 24 hours after register
common_invite_content3: 3.The commission diamonds will give to your balance
common_invite_content4: 4.You can get your each friend's comssion up to 60 days since he register
common_copy_share: Copied！You can share to your friends
common_save_share: Saved！You can share to your friends
common_invite_time: Enter friend's invitation code, get super prize
common_invite_poster_into: Scan the QRcode into Sukie.Join my family
common_invite_poster_into1: Scan the QRcode into Sukie.Enter my invitation code
common_reward: get commission when friend got diamond
common_diamond_desc: 100 diamonds withdraw $1, replying message actively and receiving gift make you get more diamonds
